name:
Excave II:
Wizard of the Underworld
description:
Excave II : Wizard of the Underworld
is the exciting sequel to the Excave
Dungeon RPG.

Bring back order to the Imperial City
by crushing a wide varied of
monstrous foes and discovering the
cause of chaos!

Discover hundreds of weapons and
items as you embark on a quest which
is bigger, more varied and challenging
than ever before!
